name: FTI Consulting
tagline: Crisis and transformation experts spanning restructuring to forensics
description: FTI Consulting is the leading global expert firm for organizations facing crisis and transformation, with more than 7,900 employees located in 32 countries and territories. Our professionals work closely with clients to anticipate, illuminate and overcome complex business challenges and make the most of opportunities.
known_for: Leading global expert firm specializing in crisis management, corporate restructuring, forensic investigations, and litigation support. Known for handling high-stakes, complex business challenges with deep technical expertise across five specialized segments.
career_path: Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Senior Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Director (3-4 yrs) → Senior Director (3-4 yrs) → Managing Director (4+ yrs) → Senior Managing Director

recruiting.process: Application → Online Assessment (numerical, verbal, logical reasoning) → First Round (30-60 min behavioral/case with Senior Analyst or Engagement Manager) → Final Round (2-3 interviews with Directors/Partners including case + behavioral)
recruiting.unique: Pre-recorded video interview required; preference forms must be completed; two-stage process with emphasis on both technical and behavioral fit
recruiting.timeline: Applications open late August-September for diversity events, September-October for general recruiting; process takes several weeks to 2 months from application to offer

byu.tip: Small but established BYU presence (36 alumni all-time). Network with alumni in Corporate Finance & Restructuring and Forensic segments where BYU representation is strongest.
